name: WriteCareNotes Module Completion Tracker
description: Tracks and verifies complete module implementation

actions.prompt:
Verify complete module implementation for WriteCareNotes:

**Backend Verification:**
- [ ] Service class with business logic
- [ ] Repository/DAO with database operations
- [ ] API routes with middleware
- [ ] Input validation schemas
- [ ] Error handling and logging
- [ ] Unit tests (90%+ coverage)
- [ ] Integration tests

**Frontend Verification:**
- [ ] React components with TypeScript
- [ ] State management implementation
- [ ] Form validation and error handling
- [ ] Responsive design
- [ ] Accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA)
- [ ] Component tests
- [ ] i18n implementation

**Database Verification:**
- [ ] Migration files
- [ ] Seed data
- [ ] Proper indexes
- [ ] Foreign key constraints
- [ ] Audit trail columns

**Documentation Verification:**
- [ ] OpenAPI documentation
- [ ] Code comments and JSDoc
- [ ] README updates
- [ ] Architecture decisions

**Security & Compliance:**
- [ ] Input sanitization
- [ ] Data encryption
- [ ] Audit logging
- [ ] GDPR compliance
- [ ] Healthcare regulations

**Testing Verification:**
- [ ] Unit tests pass
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] E2E tests pass
- [ ] Security tests pass
- [ ] Performance benchmarks met

Run verification commands and provide a completion report with any missing items.
